casebody.data:
STATE
v.
George Earl GOODE, Jr. No. 10A94-6. Supreme Court of North Carolina. November 17, 2005. Diane Savage, for George Earl Goode, Jr. Barry S. McNeill, Special Deputy Attorney General, Thomas H. Lock, District Attorney, for State of NC.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 15th day of November 2005 by Defendant to Deem Delivery Date of Transcript on 10 November 2005:

"Motion Allowed by order of the Court in conference this the 17th day of November 2005."
